content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. My goal is to save as much money as possible.

I understand that the apartment is 25 square meters, but I would like to know if there are any additional costs that I should be aware of.

I want to be a good tenant, so I would like to negotiate with you for the best price possible.

Do you have any questions for me?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. I appreciate your desire to be a good tenant and negotiate for the best price possible.

In addition to the monthly rental payment, there will be a security deposit of one month's rent due upon signing the lease. There will also be a small monthly fee for maintenance and upkeep of the apartment.

Do you have any questions about these additional costs or would you like to discuss the rental price further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all I need to know.

I agree to the price of x Euro. Thank you for your time.

I will sign the lease and pay the security deposit and rental fee as soon as possible.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Emilia. I appreciate your prompt response and understanding. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
